data.title: Northern State University In Aberdeen, South Dakota
data.meta_description: At Northern, you’ll receive an education that’s high-quality, affordable—and personalized for you. You’ll experience hands-on learning guided by world-class, supportive faculty. You’ll also enjoy a full campus life, with opportunities to choose from numerous student activities and events—all in a safe, welcoming community.
data.text: At Northern, you’ll receive an education that’s high-quality, affordable—and personalized for you. You’ll experience hands-on learning guided by world-class, supportive faculty. You’ll also enjoy a full campus life, with opportunities to choose from numerous student activities and events—all in a safe, welcoming community. At Northern, you’ll find a university that’s the right fit for you—you’ll find a place to belong.
